Traveldeal

Where to go, what to do and finding the best rates; Booking a hotel, holiday or activity often involves a lot of hassle. Traveldeal takes that hassle away by finding the best value deals in unique locations.

  • www.traveldeal.nl
  • www.traveldeal.be

About Our Growth

Founded in 2015, Traveldeal offers daily hotel, travel and activity orientated deals with a focus on quality and value based pricing. The company is growing rapidly in terms of revenue and quantity and quality in product(s).

In the future

With the current growth in the Netherlands Traveldeal is looking for expansion internationally, for example Belgium and France while keeping our systems and team in line to scale with a strong foundation. Customer focus is our main value in order to push relevant deals and increase retention.
